product.title: 4 Pups and a Worm | Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
by Eric Seltzer

The adorable art and rollicking verse of Eric Seltzer introduce us to four handy pups and Sherm the Worm. This team can do anything you need—from drying your toes to blowing your nose. 4 Pups and a Worm is fun to listen to and even more fun to read. Next time you’re in a jam, this book will make you want to pick up the phone to call 4 Pups and a Worm!

Tie-in Activity: Read this book as motivation before you and your children tackle a chore together! You can even pretend to be your own team (3 Kids and a Mom). Whether it’s cleaning up toys or any other task, getting your children excited about helping will make the work seem much easier.
